title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 49 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 49 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Hear this, all ye people; give ear, all ye inhabitants of the world:
lineList.cn: （可拉后裔的诗，交与伶长）万民哪，你们都当听这话，世上一切的居民，

lineList.en: Both low and high, rich and poor, together.
lineList.cn: 无论上流下流，富足贫穷，都当留心听。

lineList.en: My mouth shall speak of wisdom; and the meditation of my heart shall be of understanding.
lineList.cn: 我口要说智慧的言语。我必要想通达的道理。

lineList.en: I will incline mine ear to a parable: I will open my dark saying upon the harp.
lineList.cn: 我要侧耳听比喻，用琴解谜语。

lineList.en: Wherefore should I fear in the days of evil, when the iniquity of my heels shall compass me about?
lineList.cn: 在患难的日子，奸恶随我脚跟，四面环绕我，我何必惧怕。

lineList.en: They that trust in their wealth, and boast themselves in the multitude of their riches;
lineList.cn: 那些倚仗财货自夸钱财多的人，

lineList.en: None of them can by any means redeem his brother, nor give to God a ransom for him:
lineList.cn: 一个也无法赎自己的弟兄，也不能替他将赎价给神，

lineList.en: (For the redemption of their soul is precious, and it ceaseth for ever:)
lineList.cn: 叫他长远活着，不见朽坏。

lineList.en: That he should still live for ever, and not see corruption.
lineList.cn: 因为赎他生命的价值极贵，只可永远吧休。

lineList.en: For he seeth that wise men die, likewise the fool and the brutish person perish, and leave their wealth to others.
lineList.cn: 他必见智慧人死。又见愚顽人和畜类人，一同灭亡，将他们的财货留给别人。

lineList.en: Their inward thought is, that their houses shall continue for ever, and their dwelling places to all generations; they call their lands after their own names.
lineList.cn: 他们心里思想，他们的家室必永存，住宅必留到万代。他们以自己的名，称自己的地。

lineList.en: Nevertheless man being in honour abideth not: he is like the beasts that perish.
lineList.cn: 但人居尊贵中不能长久，如同死亡的畜类一样。

lineList.en: This their way is their folly: yet their posterity approve their sayings. Selah.
lineList.cn: 他们行的这道，本为自己的愚昧。但他们以后的人，还佩服他们的话语。（细拉）。

lineList.en: Like sheep they are laid in the grave; death shall feed on them; and the upright shall have dominion over them in the morning; and their beauty shall consume in the grave from their dwelling.
lineList.cn: 他们如同羊群派定下阴间。死亡必作他们的牧者。到了早晨，正直人必管辖他们。他们的美容，必被阴间所灭，以致无处可存。

lineList.en: But God will redeem my soul from the power of the grave: for he shall receive me. Selah.
lineList.cn: 只是神必救赎我的灵魂，脱离阴间的权柄，因他必收纳我。（细拉）

lineList.en: Be not thou afraid when one is made rich, when the glory of his house is increased;
lineList.cn: 见人发财家室增荣的时候，你不要惧怕。

lineList.en: For when he dieth he shall carry nothing away: his glory shall not descend after him.
lineList.cn: 因为他死的时候，什么也不能带去。他的荣耀不能随他下去。

lineList.en: Though while he lived he blessed his soul: and men will praise thee, when thou doest well to thyself.
lineList.cn: 他活着的时候，虽然自夸为有福，（你若利己，人必夸奖你）。

lineList.en: He shall go to the generation of his fathers; they shall never see light.
lineList.cn: 他仍必归到他历代的祖宗那里，永不见光。

lineList.en: Man that is in honour, and understandeth not, is like the beasts that perish.
lineList.cn: 人在尊贵中，而不醒悟，就如死亡的畜类一样。
